t2.Opportune Strike: Crit Chance is increased by 150 and Crit DMG is increased by 30%.
t2.Warlike: Increases ATK by 7% and CC Resist by 30 per enemy. This can be stacked up to max 10 times.
t2.Offensive Guard: ATK rises equal to half of P.DEF and received P.DMG decreases by 15%.
t2.Tactical Foresight: Dodge rate is increased by 200 and takes 10% reduced DMG.
t2.Blood Wrath: Increases Lifesteal by 200 and ATK Spd by 200.
